objectives.objective_text: Synthesize statics, dynamics, and biblical theology of creation order.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Testing and Failure Analysis (Iterative Improvement)
objectives.objective_text: Design controlled tests with repeatable procedures.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Testing and Failure Analysis (Iterative Improvement)
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize testing data into a technical report with statistical confidence.
